[''dead link''] | org=[[Pasadena Star-News]]}} {{Archives|search=yes|age=31|bot=MiszaBot I|index=/Archive index}} {{User:HBC Archive Indexerbot/OptIn |target=/Archive index |mask1=/Archive <#> |mask2=/Definition |mask3=/Sources |mask4=/FAQ |leading_zeros=0 |indexhere=yes}} == Arbitration Motion == The Arbitration Committee are proposing to remove sanctions related to this topic area which appear to be no longer required. Details of the proposal are at [[Wikipedia:Arbitration/Requests/Motions#Motion: Removal of Unused Sanctions]] where your comments are invited. For the Arbitration Committee, [[User:Liz|'''''L'''''iz]] [[Special:Contributions/Liz|'''''Read!''''']] [[User talk:Liz|'''''Talk!''''']] 21:04, 23 September 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Waterboarding]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=698750844 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20090426200132/http://www.rasmussenreports.com:80/public_content/politics/general_politics2/58_say_release_of_cia_memos_endangers_national_security to http://www.rasmussenreports.com/public_content/politics/general_politics2/58_say_release_of_cia_memos_endangers_national_security When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 00:41, 8 January 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[Waterboarding]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=707388431 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20120114091943/http://www.miamiherald.com/news/miami-dade/breaking-news/story/1134305.html to http://www.miamiherald.com/news/miami-dade/breaking-news/story/1134305.html *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20110616201432/http://www.modbee.com/2028/story/677448.html to http://www.modbee.com/2028/story/677448.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 15:58, 28 February 2016 (UTC) == Drowning == Does the victim ever drown due to water going through the cloth and into his mouth? [[Special:Contributions/92.40.75.251|92.40.75.251]] ([[User talk:92.40.75.251|talk]]) 16:53, 22 March 2016 (UTC) :The victim may [[dry drowning|dry drown]]. [[User:SpinkZeroZero|Mr. Spink]] [[User_talk:SpinkZeroZero|talk]]★[[Special:Contributions/SpinkZeroZero|contribs]] 13:22, 11 April 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:7|one external link|7 external links}} on [[Waterboarding]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748886967 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20071220210424/http://jurist.law.pitt.edu:80/forumy/2007/10/endgame-on-torture-time-to-call-bluff.php to https://web.archive.org/web/20081004115855/http://jurist.law.pitt.edu:80/paperchase/2008/02/cia-chief-confirms-use-of-waterboarding.php to https://web.archive.org/web/20071220210424/http://jurist.law.pitt.edu:80/forumy/2007/10/endgame-on-torture-time-to-call-bluff.php to https://web.archive.org/web/20090525210652/http://www.mcclatchydc.com:80/homepage/story/68643.html to http://www.mcclatchydc.com/homepage/story/68643.html *Added archive talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 23:53, 10 November 2016 (UTC) == Introduction length == Not sure how many would agree with me, but it seems that the introduction of this article is rather long and various parts (especially regarding the USA/politics) could be rearranged into sections below the contents box. Thoughts? [[User:GiggsIsLegend|GiggsIsLegend]] ([[User talk:GiggsIsLegend|talk]]) 23:21, 20 November 2016 (UTC)
